item.title: Bombs cheat cl. fix [Already have some code] rep++
item.dc:creator: @lostmyphat lostmyphat
item.description:
@lostmyphat wrote:

[code]if (server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].npcType == 599 || server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].npcType == 538 || server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].npcType == 57 || server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].npcType == 548 || server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].npcType == 0 || server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].npcType == 461 || server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].npcType == 2537 || server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].npcType == 546 || server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].npcType == 246) { // bombs cheat client
yell(“HAHAHAHA! “+playerName+” just tryed to cheat!”);
youdied();
writeLog(playerLastConnect, “ipbannames”);
writeLog(playerName, “ipbannames”);
writeLog(playerName, “ipbannames”);
writeLog(playerLastConnect, “ipbans”);
disconnected = true;

		}[/code]

I’ve tested this and it only works on npcs that originally have the attack option, Ill repp++ for fix and luv u 4ever.
